publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1712 Linda Fabiani: World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative—That the Parliament welcomes the initiative of the World Council of Churches, "Decade to Overcome Violence", which was officially launched in Berlin on 4 February 2001; congratulates Action of Churches Together in Scotland on its commitment to take part in the initiative and looks forward to its official launch in Scotland later in the year.
S1M-1712 World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative (lodged on 2 March 2001) Fergus Ewing*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1712 World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative (lodged on 2 March 2001) Alex Neil*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1712 World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative (lodged on 2 March 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-1712 World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative (lodged on 2 March 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*, Michael Russell*

S1M-1712 Linda Fabiani: World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative—That the Parliament welcomes the initiative of the World Council of Churches, "Decade to Overcome Violence", which was officially launched in Berlin on 4 February 2001; congratulates Action of Churches Together in Scotland on its commitment to take part in the initiative and looks forward to its official launch in Scotland later in the year. Supported by: Fergus Ewing, Richard Lochhead, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Alex Neil, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Christine Grahame, Andrew Wilson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Michael Russell
S1M-1712 World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative (lodged on 2 March 2001) Shona Robison*, Tricia Marwick*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1712 World Council of Churches "Decade to Overcome Violence" Initiative (lodged on 2 March 2001) Robin Harper*, Ms Sandra White*
